title: Taxpayer Freedom and Fairness Act
content: Taxpayer Freedom and Fairness Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the 15 percent individual income tax rate to ten percent over five years. Authorizes a married couple to file a combined return under which: (1) each spouse is taxed using the rates applicable to unmarried individuals. But (2) their joint tax liability shall be for the aggregate amount resulting from applying the separate rates to each taxable income.
